Package de.fhbielefeld.scl.database.rest

Class ObservedObjectResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhbielefeld.scl.database.rest.ObservedObjectResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    @Path("observedobject")
public class ObservedObjectResource
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    REST Class for manage of observed objects.

      • listStatus

        @GET
@Path("listStatus")
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response listStatus()
        Lists all observedobjects with their current state. This state contains information about activity, number of datasets and object based options. Because this is calculated this can take some time.
        Returns:
        json list of observedobjects with stati

      • getStatus

        @GET
@Path("getStatus")
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getStatus​(@QueryParam("id")
                                           java.lang.Long id)
        Gets the state of the observedobject with the given id.This state contains information about activity, number of datasets and object based options. Because this is calculated this can take some time.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the observedobject to get the status from
        Returns:
        json list of observedobjects with stati

@Path("listForTypename")

        Returns:

@Path("listCollectingData")

      • listChilds

        @GET
@Path("listChilds")
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response listChilds​(@QueryParam("parent_id")
                                            java.lang.Long parent_id,
                                            @QueryParam("recursive")
                                            boolean recursive)
        Returns an list of observed object for an given type.
        Parameters:
        parent_id - Id of the parent, if null and recursive = true, this will result in an list() method call
        recursive - If set, childs will fetched recursive
        Returns:
        List of observedobjects

      • listParents

        @GET
@Path("listParents")
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response listParents​(@QueryParam("id")
                                             java.lang.Long id)
        Gets an list of all parents. The first in list, is the direct parent, the latest ist the first ancestor
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the object, where to get the parents from
        Returns:
        List of parent observed objects

      • search

        @GET
@Path("search")
@Produces("application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response search​(@QueryParam("searchexpression")
                                        java.lang.String searchexpression)
        Searches an list of objects by the given search expresseion. This expressen could contain an object name, an part of it or an tag.
        Parameters:
        searchexpression - Expression on that are observedobjects searched
        Returns:
        List of observedobjects that matching the expression
